Modernas brīvdienu dizaina mājas tavai a: Modern holiday design houses for your relaxation!
Klusuma greznība Siguldas sirdī!: The luxury of silence in the heart of Sigulda!
Īpaša atpūtas vieta tiem, kuri meklē mie: A special place of relaxation for those seeking peace, presence and a sense of beauty in the very heart of Sigulda. Our story begins where design merges with nature and peace becomes the greatest luxury.
Atrodoties tieši līdzās Panorāmas ratam: Located right next to the Panorama Wheel and Festival Square, we have created modern holiday design houses that offer not only accommodation but also a sensory experience. Here the landscape becomes part of the interior, and each season provides a new perspective – from misty autumn mornings to snowy peaks or sunny summer days.
Mēs piedāvājam vietu, kur vienkāršība no: We offer a place where simplicity means quality, minimalism means conscious comfort, and in every detail you can feel the love for the place where we live. This project is our invitation to return to what is essential – peace, presence and beauty.
Izsmalcināta atpūta starp pilsētu un dab: Sophisticated relaxation between city and nature!
Miers nav kaut kur tālu! Tas ir šeit - s: Peace is not somewhere far away! It is here - between design, nature and You!
Drona skats uz māju parku: Drone view of the house park
Ko sniedz pieredze Siguldas Skatos?: What does the experience at Siguldas Skati offer?
Dizaina brīvdienu mājas ar skatu uz Sigu: Design holiday houses with a view of Sigulda!
Mūsu brīvdienu dizaina mājās nav steigas: There's no rush in our holiday design houses – this is a place where you can breathe deeper, hear yourself and relax without stress.
Pārdomāts dizains, kvalitatīvas detaļas: Thoughtful design, quality details and coziness that makes you feel at home – only better.
Šī nav tikai naktsmītne – tā ir iespēja: This is not just accommodation - it's an opportunity to stop, feel the environment and see Sigulda through different eyes.
Vietu pašā Siguldas sirdī, kur daba un p: A place in the very heart of Sigulda, where nature and city cultural events meet within walking distance.
Sigulda ir vairāk nekā galamērķis – tā i: Sigulda is more just a destination – it's a feeling.
Mēs esam tepat, lai palīdzētu Tev to iep: We are here to help you discover it at your own pace.
Ko vēl darīt Siguldā?: What else to do in Sigulda?
Sigulda ir vieta, kur daba, kultūra un p: Sigulda is a place where nature, culture and adventures merge into one landscape. Regardless of the season, everyone can find their own rhythm here – whether it's a leisurely walk on nature trails, cultural enjoyment or a small adventure above the treetops.
Uzzini pirmais par jaunumiem!: Be the first to learn about news!
Reģistrācijai nav vecuma ierobežojumu: There is no age limit for registration
Viesiem ir jāuzvedas klusu no plkst. 23: Guests must be quiet from 23:00 to 07:00
Mājoklis aprīkots ar dūmu detektoru: The housing is equipped with a smoke detector

Sazinies ar mums, ja rodas neskaidrības: Contact us if you have any questions or want to learn more about our holiday design

Siguldas Skati, brīvdienu mājas, atpūta,: Siguldas Skati, holiday houses, relaxation, nature, design, Sigulda...

Thank you! Your message has been received.
Notikusi kļūda! Mēģini vēlreiz vai sazin: An error occurred! Please try again or contact us by phone.
Sazinies ar mums, ja rodas neskaidrības: Contact us if you have any questions or want to learn more about our holiday design houses.
Mūsu brīvdienu mājas atrodas Siguldas ce: Our holiday houses are located in the center of Sigulda, at Cēsu Street 17, next to the Sigulda Panorama Wheel and Festival Square.
Vai pie brīvdienu mājām ir pieejama auto: Is there parking available at the holiday houses?
Jā, viesiem ir pieejama bezmaksas privāt: Yes, free private parking is available for guests at the accommodation.
Jā, naktsmītnes ir piemērota ģimenēm. \": Yes, the accommodation is suitable for families. The "Black" house has a separate children's room and can comfortably accommodate two adults and up to two children.
Kādi ir reģistrēšanās un izrakstīšanās l: What are the check-in and check-out times?
Jā, visās telpās ir pieejams bezmaksas W: Yes, free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms.
Vai brīvdienu mājās ir pieejama virtuve?: Is there a kitchen available in the holiday houses?
Jā, visās brīvdienu mājās ir pilnībā apr: Yes, all holiday houses have a fully equipped kitchen with stovetop, refrigerator, dishwasher, coffee maker and everything needed for meal preparation.
Vai pieejama bērnu gultiņa vai papildus: Is a baby cot or extra bedding available for children?
Jā, pēc pieprasījuma var nodrošināt bērn: Yes, a baby cot can be provided upon request
Ar mājdzīvniekiem pašlaik atpūta mūsu di: Currently pets are not allowed in our design houses.
Vai mājā ir gaisa kondicionētājs un apku: Is there air conditioning and heating in the house?
Jā, māja ir aprīkota ar gaisa kondicionē: Yes, the house is equipped with air conditioning and an efficient heating system to ensure comfort in any season.
Kā notiek rezervācija?: How does the reservation process work?
Rezervāciju iespējams ir veikt tiešsaist: Reservations can be made online through the booking.com reservation platform
Vai sauna un džakūzis ir iekļauts cenā?: Are the sauna and jacuzzi included in the price?
Nē, sauna un džakuzi nav iekļauti naktsm: No, the sauna and jacuzzi are not included in the accommodation price – they are available for an additional fee, with prior reservation.
